EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Redis Conf 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at Redis Conf. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures (including Redis!) to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]> to begin a discussion.
Need some dev/test or CI environments? Try running Spring Boot on our public Cloud Foundry instance, Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring]]>, a platform engineered for Spring Boot.
In the meantime, start your Cloud-Native Journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Download and read free chapters of Cloud-Native Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]>, by Josh Long and Kenny Bastani.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Common Redis Use Cases for Cloud Native Apps and Microservices <[[http://redisconf.com/sessions.php]]> - Nathaniel T. Schutta, Software Architect, Pivotal
Click here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/redis-conf-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]> for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry.
Stay in touch with the Pivotal Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Pivotal]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-redis-conf-sf-q218]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
